title: ulagam maNNE
sahitya:
ulagam maNNE uDalum maNNE uyirum uNarvum maNNA


caraNam 1    azhagum maNNE aNiyum maNNE azhagin punnakai maNNO amudak-kiLi mozhi maNNA
    caraNam 2    manamum poyyE kanavum poyyE vaLar uLLarivum poyyA manidAnmAvum poyyA
    caraNam 3    inamum uravum dinamum mArum idayat-tuDi mAriDumA udayak-kadir mAriDumA
